𒃸 KAR₂ gear 𒀉𒃸 akar a'gear "util" 𒄑𒀉𒃸 ĝeš'a2-kar2 Geschirr "implement, tool, utensil" Akk. unūtu √nutz

𒂇 AGAʳ axe ascia āšĝar 𒍏𒀉𒀸𒃻
𒂇 AGAʳ in 𒂇𒃸 conquer (𒃸 KAR₂) √guerre gear

𒀉𒃻 a2-ĝar aĝar "a tool"

𒉬 akar a'gear "armor" @ guerre Akk. 𒀊𒈛𒌅 ap-luḫ-tu apluhtu

𒆕𒋻 kuksu₂ 𒋻 kuksu 𒋻 KU KU₅ Egge? ‘gear’ "a garden tool"

𒀉 A₂ arm also gear weapon
